text: How Institutions Think (first published 1986) is a book that contains the published version of the Frank W. Abrams Lectures delivered by the influential cultural anthropologist Mary Douglas at Syracuse University in March 1985. ==Reviews== *Ian Hacking in the London Review of Books, 8/22, 18 December 1986. *Kenneth Lipartito in the Business History Review, 80/1, Spring 2006, pp. 135-140.
